text: Digaula la nia hege ni Christ? Au e helekai be tangada hagawelewele, gei au di hege koia e humalia i digaula, idimaa, au gu ngalua damana i digaula. Au gu lawalawa haga logo i digaula, guu logo ogu holongo ne hagamamaawa, guu logo dogu dadaaligi hagahuaidu i digaula, hoohoo bolo gaa made.11.23 Nnegau 16.23
